arguments.message: PR #60 (Web Dashboard) review complete. Claude flagged 3 issues: Bot API failure in discord.ts:96, Dockerfile output path nesting, console logging. Changes requested. https://github.com/BillChirico/bills-bot/pull/60#issuecomment-3905973261
